title: Dear Viola
teaser: Viola Morse, a lifelong Vermonter, died last year. After living in the same town for ninety-nine years, she must have left quite an imprint.  State of the Re:Union set up a voice-mail box so Viola’s friends, family, and admirers could share their memories in their own words.  This first piece in our new audio obituary series was produced by SOTRU intern Sara Brooke Curtis.
